meanings.definition: A person who carries out a task or duty.
meanings.sent1: The executer completed the project on time.
meanings.sent2: The executer followed the instructions carefully.
meanings.sent3: The executer made sure everything was done perfectly.
meanings.sent4: She was the executer of the team, ensuring success.

meanings.definition: A device or program that performs a specific function or task.
meanings.sent1: The robotic executer efficiently sorted the items.
meanings.sent2: The automatic executer processed the data quickly.
meanings.sent3: The electronic executer never made mistakes.
meanings.sent4: The digital executer revolutionized the industry.

meanings.definition: To put into effect or carry out a plan or action.
meanings.sent1: She will executer the new strategy tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: He executer his duties with dedication.
meanings.sent3: They executer the plan with precision.
meanings.sent4: The team will executer the project efficiently.
meanings.sent5: The leader executer the decision swiftly.
